description: This is a test script for the Cerebras model integration, containing unit tests for various functionalities such as basic response, streaming, asynchronous calls, memory handling, structured output, and history management within the agent framework.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model class used for testing structured output responses, representing a movie script with title, genre, and plot.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: A helper function to verify that the metrics in the response contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic functionality of the agent with a simple prompt and verifies the response and metrics.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the streaming response functionality of the agent, ensuring it yields multiple responses with content.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Asynchronous test for the basic agent response, verifying content and message roles.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous test for streaming responses, verifying each response content.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the agent's memory feature, ensuring it retains context across multiple interactions.

methods.name: test_structured_output
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to produce structured output conforming to a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the history management feature of the agent, verifying message count and sequence.
